abstract: There are plenty of ideas, but any systemic solution has to come from the government.
snippet: There are plenty of ideas, but any systemic solution has to come from the government.
lead_paragraph: My column this Saturday is about the need to find a systemic solution to the problems that continue to plague the banking system. With Citigroup getting a new bailout a few months ago, and Bank of America getting one this week, clearly the current “let’s fix one bank at a time” approach isn’t working.

headline.main: Can Anybody Out There Fix the Banking System?
